transcript: you can't add more to your plate before you take away I remember there was a time when I had six locations and I was planning to get to 10 I needed more time in order to do that for me I was going to give up the Ravens I'm from Baltimore I gave up watching and following football cuz you know there's obviously the watching football but then all of the ancillary stuff around it and I gave up basically all the social interactions that I had around that with friends because a lot of them that was like the main thing that we interacted on and I remember making this video I just went Facebook live and no one gave a because I was just a kid who owned a couple gyms but I was like I just realized that like I have to give these things up that I love and it was because I loved the thing that I wanted more
